name: trumporfalse
description: Trump or False: A Markov Chain Gamesperiment

scripts.watch-js: watchify -v -e src/js/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] --debug -o dist/app.js
scripts.build-js: browserify -v -e src/js/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -o dist/app.js
scripts.markov-watch: watchify -v -e src/js/markovGenerator.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -o dist/markovGenerator.js

author: Leo Langinger & Michael Hazani
